extendedInfo.description: This app makes an Overlord's job much easier by simplifying monster management tasks.You may:Add monsters to manage their statistics!Contains all available monsters, including Road to Legend encounters and chiefs.Displays all capabilities of added monsters including descriptions of all abilities!Fully user-modifiable data located in /mnt/sdcard/DescentAssistant!Restoring defaults is as easy as deleting these two XML files.Configurable preferences (number of players, campaign level) makes adding monsters even easier!Adding duplicate monsters from the monster cards!Rename monsters with a tap!Coming Soon:Optimization of XML parsing.

reviews.title: Good but needs heros too
reviews.comment: U should add heros so the hero players can track them
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works great, even has boss cards
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only first edition
reviews.comment: Great program, wish it was for the current edition
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful.
reviews.comment: Works perfectly. Helps a LOT when playing as the Overlord. Saves time and space during game play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A couple little additions would make it even better. A button or two on each creature card that adds either a duplicate creature or a master version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where\'s my language selection?
reviews.comment: Good app but I hate it when any app sets the default language based on the phone language. I want to use it in french o  my english phone! Is there a way to add the language option in the preferences please?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Duh ?
reviews.comment: People are not too bright for rating an app poorly that came out before second edition even existed. The author has no obligation to redo the entire app because ff wanted to gouge us for more money. Great job on the app!
reviews.author: B Mc

reviews.title: For first edition only.
reviews.comment: Pretty much what the title says. I\'d give it more stars if it had the ability to show the stats for second edition now that it\'s out. However I would imagine that this would be an excellent resource for those still in first.
reviews.author: A Google User
